name: qa-automation-portfolio-coursehub
description: This repository is part of my professional QA portfolio. It focuses on showcasing real-world testing practices across different layers of an application.

scripts.api:test:report: mkdir -p docs/reports && newman run collections/coursehub.postman_collection.json -e environments/coursehub.local.postman_environment.json -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export docs/reports/api-report.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "CourseHub API Test Report"
